newsitem.title: USA: Rockwell unit gets $1.2 mln contract.
newsitem.headline: Rockwell unit gets $1.2 mln contract.

text.p: Rockwell Automation, a unit of Rockwell International Corp, said Monday that Griset Engineering S.A. of Saint Paul, France, placed a $1.2 million order for drive systems for a hot and a cold mill to be installed at Brush Wellman Inc, Elmore, Ohio.
Griset Engineering manufactures specialized rolling mills and process lines for non-ferrous materials.

Scheduled to begin production in 1998, the mills are part of a major expansion at Brush Wellman to produce copper beryllium alloy coil and stock for such electronic industry applications as printed circuit boards and connectors.
